This lowers the risk of working with us as you will have control over the whole system, We are not involved in the monetary flow - which ensures product stability and no financial risk for our partners.2) No high fees for end users due to lack of middlemen, you get VISA's base rates + the margins you decide to add.3) We only take a 1 time payment to launch the project - no monthly maintenance fees or commission sharing.4) A turnkey solution made specifically for you - the solution becomes yours, independent of Hawex.Time for completion of project: 4 to 6 months - this includes obtaining licenses if needed, creating an app for you if needed (if not, we connect API to your exisisting site/app).
